body.p:
Richmond Ky March 11th 1861
To his Exellency Beriah Magoffin

We, the undersigned, have formed ourselves into a company of Volunteer Reserves, and tender our servises to the State of Kentucky, to aid in defence of her rights, her honor, and her Soil from invasion; expressly stipulating Should we ever be called upon to fight our brethren of the Southern States, that we be honorably discharged from Service
